CONFIG.ua: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/130.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 Edg/130.0.0.0

values: 等候；延迟；伺候；当服务员；（尤指长期地）希望；（在电话中）搁置；暂停服务；（在计算机中）暂停执行指令；（在交通中）暂时停留
等候；服侍；（尤指圣诞节的）街头歌手；（尤指过去的）官方乐队

word_group.brief_definition: 排队等候；排队等待；排队等
伺候；等待；等候；服侍；招待
(要说出令人吃惊或高兴的事情)听着, 听好了；等待时机
伺候进餐, (往饭桌上)端饭上菜
(在餐馆)端盘子, 招待顾客

word_group.phrase: time and tide wait for no man

word_group.brief_definition: 为下一个事件（或难题）发生做好准备
word_group.phrase: wait for the other shoe to drop
wait on someone hand and foot

bilingual.source: Stop and wait at a red light.
The maiden wanted to make the King wait.
You just wait for good things to happen to you.
bilingual.target: 你只是等待好事发生在你身上。

bilingual.source: People used to go to a shop, stand in a queue and wait.
bilingual.target: 人们过去常常去商店排队等待。

bilingual.source: Turn off the heat and then wait for 10 minutes before serving the porridge.
bilingual.target: 关火后等待10分钟再上粥。

bilingual.source: Do not wait — fill out our form and come to learn English in Los Angeles!
bilingual.target: 不要等待——填写我们的表格，来洛杉矶学习英语吧！

bilingual.source: When I was a little boy, I couldn't wait for the dinner on the eve of Spring Festival to come.
bilingual.target: 我小时候，迫不及待地等待除夕晚餐的到来。

bilingual.source: If they're rushing into something and should wait and be patient, you could say "hold your horses".
bilingual.target: 如果他们急于做某事而应该等待并保持耐心，你可以说“稍安勿躁”。

bilingual.source: We wait for the rain to stop.

list.abstract: wait，英语单词，n. 等待， 等待时间；v. 等, 耽搁， 等候； 等候, 延缓， 期待。
《Wait》是Fuchengk的专辑《Big Bug》里的一首歌曲。

yingyinNormal.en: Then you wait. You wait. And whoever speaks first loses.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你就只要等待时机，耐心等，谁先开口谁就输了。

yingyinNormal.en: You'd wait? Yes, absolutely. I would wait and wait, then I'd wait some more. Really?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你会等待？没错，我会等待，一直等待，然后我还会再等下去。真的？

yingyinNormal.en: Wait to die. Wait to live. Wait for an absolution that would never come.
yingyinNormal.zh: 等死，等着活命，等待宽恕，但永远等不到。

yingyinNormal.en: That couch is good, right? Worth the year and a half wait.
yingyinNormal.zh: 沙发很棒，是吧？值得一年半的等待。

yingyinNormal.en: Afterward, the 700 people in the boats had nothing to do but wait.
yingyinNormal.zh: 后来，救生艇上的七百人只有等待。

yingyinNormal.en: And Minister Ahmad will wait with the convoy by the horses.
yingyinNormal.zh: 艾哈迈德大人会和侍从一起在马旁等待。

yingyinNormal.en: No kidding? Oh yeah. In fact you know what I'd do? What? I'd wait.
yingyinNormal.zh: 真的？你知道我会怎么做？我会等待下去。

yingyinNormal.en: When they get on target, and they will get on target, wait to engage.
yingyinNormal.zh: 当她们锁定目标，她们一定会锁定等待发动进攻。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay, so all I have to do is wait to have these visions and then tell you where this Omega thing is?
yingyinNormal.zh: 好，那我要做的就是等待这些幻象，然后再告诉你们这家伙在哪儿？

yingyinNormal.en: You're gonna make sure she's all right, right? Kat? All right, I'm gonna show you where you can wait. Okay?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你会救她，对吧？凯特？好吧，我来，我来带你去等待室，好吗？

yingyinNormal.en: I'm gonna go inside, put on my coziest pajamas, curl up with a good book and wait for this nightmare to be over.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我要回家穿上我最舒服的睡衣，蜷在床上看本好书，等待这场噩梦的结束。

yingyinNormal.en: We cannot allow that to happen. We can't wait for Congress any longer. We gave Congress every chance.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们决不能让他们得逞。我们不能再等待国会了。我们给国会的机会已经够多了。

yingyinNormal.en: Of course, we're gonna have to wait and see how the markets react, but that should lay to rest any concerns about the bank's health.
yingyinNormal.zh: 当然，我们要等待观察市场的反应，但这应该解决了关于银行状况的担忧。

yingyinNormal.en: The procedure for diagnosing pinworms is to wait until the subject is asleep, and the worms crawl out of the rectum for air.
yingyinNormal.zh: 诊断蛲虫病的步骤，就是等待直到宿主陷入沉睡状态，然后蛲虫从宿主的直肠爬出来透气。

yingyinNormal.en: Their mission was to assess their world, and if it showed potential then they could send out a signal, bed down for the long nap, wait to be rescued.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他们的任务是对所到之地进行评估，倘若发现可行性，就发射信号然后进入休眠，等待救援。

yingyinNormal.en: Wait, wait! You got it. Wait, wait, wait!
yingyinNormal.zh: 等等，等等。你快点。等等，等等。

yingyinNormal.en: Wait wait wait, how is that not amusing?
yingyinNormal.zh: 等一下，这哪里不好笑啊？

yingyinNormal.en: Wait, wait, where'd I go?
yingyinNormal.zh: 慢着，我怎么消失了？

yingyinNormal.en: Wait a minute. Wait a minute. Wait a minute. Okay...
yingyinNormal.zh: 等一下。等等，呃，好的，呃……

yingyinNormal.en: Wait! Wait! What are we doing?
yingyinNormal.zh: 等等，我们在干吗呢？

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 等待；等候；侍候；服侍；宫廷侍候

word_family.mean: v. 等候；等待；迫不及待；侍候进餐；当侍者；等着；推迟；在路边临时停车；等候…的时机

examination_example.sentence: They could take reasonable measures to ensure that phone data are not erased or altered while <highlight>waiting</highlight> for a warrant.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们可以采取合理措施，确保在等待搜查令期间，手机数据不会被删除或更改。

examination_example.sentence: There will now be a seven-day <highlight>wait</highlight> for the jobseeker's allowance.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 现在求职者将要等候七天才能领到津贴。

examination_example.sentence: We will have to <highlight>wait</highlight> and see exactly how these hard times will reshape our social fabric.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们将不得不拭目以待，看看这些困难时期究竟会如何重塑我们的社会结构。

sense_info_list.en: stay in a place looking forward to something that is expected to happen
be done or to happen at a later time
serve food as a waiter or waitress

word_usage.usage:
wait主要用作不及物动词，常与介词for连用。
wait用作及物动词通常用来指耐心地“等；等待”。在这种用法中其宾语仅限于hour、 time、 turn、return、 opportunity,  the result等名词。
例：We are now waiting the result. 我们现在在等结果。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Children who learn to <highlight>wait</highlight> for things they desire are more likely to succeed in a number of ways later in life.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 学会等待自己渴望的东西的孩子更有可能在以后的生活中在许多方面取得成功。

examination_example.sentence: They were given a choice between receiving a small reward immediately, or if they <highlight>waited</highlight> 15 minutes, they could have two.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们可以选择立即获得一个小奖励，或者如果他们等15分钟，他们就可以得到两个奖励。

examination_example.sentence: They will <highlight>wait</highlight> to see its effect.

sense_info_list.en: stay in a place looking forward to something that is expected to happen

examination_example.sentence: I couldn't <highlight>wait</highlight> to get out of there once my contract expired.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一旦合同到期，我就迫不及待地想离开哪里。

sense_info_list.en: serve food as a waiter or waitress

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 等待；等候；侍候；服侍；宫廷侍候

word_family.mean: v. 等候；等待；迫不及待；侍候进餐；当侍者；等着；推迟；在路边临时停车；等候…的时机

examination_example.sentence: It has to <highlight>wait</highlight> for the state's final approval.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它必须等待州政府的最终批准。

examination_example.sentence: She decided to <highlight>wait</highlight> for her next work-study paycheck, which was typically $ 150- $ 200, to pay for the code.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她决定等待下一次工读薪水(通常为150- 200美元)来支付代码。
等等看接下来会发生什么。

sense_info_list.en: stay in a place looking forward to something that is expected to happen
be done or to happen at a later time
serve food as a waiter or waitress

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 等待；等候；侍候；服侍；宫廷侍候

word_family.mean: v. 等候；等待；迫不及待；侍候进餐；当侍者；等着；推迟；在路边临时停车；等候…的时机

examination_example.sentence: If I had waited to have the time, I would still be <highlight>waiting</highlight> to write my novel.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果我等到有时间（才写小说），我会一直在写小说的等待中度过。

examination_example.sentence: It's better to leave your listeners wishing for more than shifting restlessly in their seats <highlight>waiting</highlight> for your speech finally to end.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 与其在座位上坐立不安地等着你的演讲结束，不如让你的听众有所期待。

examination_example.sentence: Would you mind <highlight>waiting</highlight> for half an hour, Max?

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 等待；等候；侍候；服侍；宫廷侍候

word_family.mean: v. 等候；等待；迫不及待；侍候进餐；当侍者；等着；推迟；在路边临时停车；等候…的时机

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 排队等候；排队等待；排队等

examination_example.sentence: I can’t <highlight>wait</highlight> to read the book.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我等不及地想读这本书。

examination_example.sentence: The bookstore is not very big, but lots of people are always <highlight>waiting</highlight> to get into it on weekends.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 书店不是很大，但是很多人总是在周末等着进去。

examination_example.sentence: Susan never gets upset when she has to <highlight>wait</highlight> in line.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当苏珊不得不排队等候时，她从不生气。

word_usage.usage:
wait是不及物动词，其后要加介词for才可以跟宾语。
如：I sat waiting patiently for the wedding to end. 
我坐着耐心地等待婚礼结束。
